game.name: Stickman
game.description:
Play Stickman - Use your sword and defeat all the stickmen attacking you.

Life today is hectic and full of stress. Everyone needs to vent out his or her stress and have some fun. If you too are looking for some time out of your busy schedule and want to have some action-filled moments, then Stickman games are readily available free online games for you. There are over 200+ online free Stickman games out there. Choose any cool Stickman game that will provide you fun and relaxation for hours. Some of the famous online fun games are Stick War, Stickman Archery, Henry Stickman, Trollface-Quest and so on.

Take on one online Stickman game and get ready to race, jump, shoot, fight and explore your way. Online free games bring one action and thrill, but what differentiates Stickman from others is that you get to deal with wacky and sometimes deadly stick figures. However, do not take these stick figures lightly. They may be sticky, but they are full of suspense, and they will give you lots of action and laughs too that for sure will make your game a thrill-some mix of suspense and fun.

Stickman, one of the best flash-based online games to play for boys, is made to withstand even the roughest of tumbles and falls and thrashes, as he is fit to go through the harshest conditions. Take your character to go for mountain biking, racing etc. Race your characters over the dangerous cliffs, over the dirt bike in this cool fighting game. Arm him with a rifle and get ready for a suspenseful gun battle. In case if you die in the fight, you get up again in an instant. The fun never stops in this new Stickmen game!
